title: Microsoft Announces Biggest Layoffs Yet: Up To 18,000 Workers
teaser: In the largest layoff in the company's history, it's stripping 14 percent of its workforce. CEO Satya Nadella says it's part of a plan to make the 39-year-old company more agile and productive.
